= Please Read This Before Using MacFUSE =

MacFUSE requires Mac OS X 10.4 ("Tiger") or above.

== MacFUSE Core 0.2.2 ==

  * A required update because it fixes a bug that can, under certain circumstances, zero-out the tail end of a read buffer when you read from a file. Unless you have some very good reason not to, please update to this version as soon as possible.
